Description: net ecosystem exchange or net ecosystem production (- indicates C sink)
foliage production, typically estimated as annual leaf litterfall
litterfall, including leaves, reproductive structures, twigs, and sometimes branches
production of reproductive structures (flowers, fruits, seeds)
woody mortality--i.e., $B_{ag}$ of trees that die
aboveground autotrophic respiration (*i.e.*, leaves and stems)
fallen dead wood, including coarse and sometimes fine woody debris
